sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Box, Typography } from '@mui/material'; const Hero = () => ( Welcome to the Employee Management System Streamline your employee management process with ease. Our Employee Management System (EMS) is a comprehensive solution designed to revolutionize your HR processes. We empower you to efficiently manage employee data, meticulously track performance, and seamlessly streamline workflows, all in one integrated platform. Key Features:
  • Centralized employee database for easy access and management
  • Performance tracking and management tools to foster growth
  • Automated reporting and analytics for data-driven decisions
  • Secure access and data management to protect sensitive information
  • Onboarding and offboarding process management
  • Leave and absence management
 ); export default Hero;
